thread.title: Ground News - Melissa Diann Rohde

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Melissa Diann Rohde
text:
Summary by Ground News Melissa Diann Rohde, 52, of Crestview , Florida died Monday, December 25, 2023 at her residence. Funeral services will be 1:00 PM, Saturday, December 30, 20 23 at James & Sikes Funeral Home Maddox Chapel with Rev. Chris Goodman officiating. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Jackson County Times Melissa Diann Rohde Melissa Diann Rohde, 52, of Crestview, Florida died Monday, December 25, 2023 at her residence. She was born to Larry Samuel O’Bryan and Wanda Diann McAlpin O’Bryan on January 13, 1971. She married her “Knight in Shining Armor” in 2007, where they built a life of love and laughter together. Melissa was a loving and devoted wife, mother and grammie. She was selfless and always put her family first. Melissa was a reflection and beautiful exampl…
1 hour ago · Jackson County, United States Read Full Article
